member.name: T:Windows.Media.Capture.AppCaptureManager
member.summary: Provides access to app capture settings.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Capture.AppCaptureManager.ApplySettings(Windows.Media.Capture.AppCaptureSettings)
member.summary: Applies app capture settings.
member.capability: Required to control the user settings for the Game DVR

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Capture.AppCaptureManager.GetCurrentSettings
member.summary: Gets the current app capture settings.
member.capability: Required to control the user settings for the Game DVR
member.returns: The current app capture settings.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.AppCaptureSettings.IsAppCaptureEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if app capture is enabled.
member.returns: True if app capture is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.AppCaptureSettings.IsAudioCaptureEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether audio capture is enabled.
member.returns: True if audio capture is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.AppCaptureSettings.IsCpuConstrained
member.summary: Gets a value indicating if app capture is CPU-constrained.
member.returns: True if app capture is CPU-constrained; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.AppCaptureSettings.IsDisabledByPolicy
member.summary: Gets a value indicating if app capture is disabled by policy.
member.returns: True if app capture is disabled by policy; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.AppCaptureSettings.IsGpuConstrained
member.summary: Gets a value indicating if app capture is GPU-constrained.
member.returns: True if app capture is GPU-constrained; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.AppCaptureSettings.IsHistoricalCaptureEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if historical capture is enabled.
member.returns: True if historical capture is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.AppCaptureSettings.IsHistoricalCaptureOnBatteryAllowed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether historical capture is allowed while the device is on battery power.
member.returns: True if historical capture is allowed while the device is on battery power; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.AppCaptureSettings.IsHistoricalCaptureOnWirelessDisplayAllowed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether historical capture is allowed on wireless displays.
member.returns: True if historical capture is allowed on wireless displays; otherwise, true.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.AppCaptureSettings.IsMemoryConstrained
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the device is memory-constrained.
member.returns: True if the device is memory-constrained; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if microphone capture is enabled.
member.returns: True if microphone capture is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.AppCaptureSettings.IsMicrophoneCaptureEnabledByDefault
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if microphone capture is enabled by default.
member.returns: True if microphone capture is enabled by default; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum recording length.
member.returns: The maximum recording length.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying the gain applied to the microphone audio.

member.summary: Gets or sets the screenshot destination folder.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.AppCaptureSettings.SystemAudioGain
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying the gain applied to the system audio.
